newsitem.title: POLAND: Three Polish coal miners killed in mine collapse.
newsitem.headline: Three Polish coal miners killed in mine collapse.

text.p: Three miners died and two were seriously injured on Thursday when a tunnel collapsed in a coal mine in southern Poland, PAP news agency reported.

One miner died on the spot 900 metres (2,953 ft) below ground at Zabrze-Bielszowice mine in the industrial region of Silesia and two more were fatally poisoned by methane as they tried to rescue him, the mine's deputy director Marek Szafraniec told PAP.
He said rescue teams were looking for more miners possibly trapped in the accident area. There were no further details.
